name: I Was Transported to Another World Through An Old Television And Now I Look Weird!
name_original: I Was Transported to Another World Through An Old Television And Now I Look Weird!
description:
Takashi Watanabe is a guy who lives in an apartment with his girlfriend. One day, while getting a New TV, he finds an old-styled TV that looks to be from the 1930s. Out of his curiousity, he buys it! Little does he know what it has in store for him...

CURRENTLY THIS VERSION OF THE GAME IS INCOMPLETE. THERE ARE SOME ASSETS MISSING AND BUGS HAVE NOT BEEN CHECKED. THERE IS NOT MUSIC NOR SFX AT THE CURRENT MOMENT. OTHERWISE IT IS COMPLETELY READY TO PLAY. IT IS BEING UPLOADED NOW FOR SUNOFES.
